@graph.rdfs:label: Product
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Product schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the manufacturer of the material, biosample, or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the brand of the reagent, material, or biological sample (if different from the manufacturer)
@graph.rdfs:label: brand

@graph.rdfs:comment: The catalog number or identifier of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of material. Reagent, PPE, biological samples, etc.
@graph.rdfs:label: type
Instrument
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Instrument schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the manufacturer of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: The brand of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: brand

@graph.rdfs:comment: The model number of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: model
Organization
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Organization schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the organization, team or group
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Alternative names or commonly used abbreviations for the organization, team or group
@graph.rdfs:label: alternateName

@graph.rdfs:comment: An overarching consortia, multi-institutional team or group in which the organization/team/group is a member or affiliate
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the organization's membership or affiliation in the overarching consortial, multi-institutional team or group (current, past)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliationStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: Members of this organization, team, or group
@graph.rdfs:label: members

@graph.rdfs:comment: Status of the members of this organization
@graph.rdfs:label: membershipStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource which a person played a role
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: A classification of the organization by a resource. Eg- for ClinicalTrials funders, it's ["U.S. National Institutes of Health", "Other U.S. Federal agencies", "Industry", "All others"]
@graph.rdfs:label: class

@graph.rdfs:comment: The role of an organization in its involvement with a resource
@graph.rdfs:label: role
Person
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Person schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Alternative ways in which the person's name is included in a record
@graph.rdfs:label: alternateName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The given name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: givenName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The family name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: familyName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The organization with which the person is affiliated or has membership in
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the person's membership or affiliation in an organization, team or group (current, past)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliationStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: The ORCID ID of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: orcid

@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource which a person played a role
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: The role a person played in the creation of a resource
@graph.rdfs:label: role
MonetaryGrant
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the MonetaryGrant schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the monetary grant
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The grant ID or an identifier associated with the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: The url for the grant (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: The funding organization of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: funder

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the funding organization
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The person or organization to whom or to which the grant was awarded
@graph.rdfs:label: recipient

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the recipient of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The affiliation of the recipient of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation
Analysis
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Analysis schema used for outbreak.info.

@graph.rdfs:label: Dataset
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Dataset schema used for outbreak.info.

@graph.rdfs:label: Protocol
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Protocol schema used for outbreak.info.

datePublished.description: PublicationDate of the protocol online if available

url.description: url where the protocol can be found

identifier.description: An identifier associated with the protocol (if available)

doi.description: A DOI associated with the protocol if available

warning.description: Precautions, warnings, and/or safety warnings associated with the protocol

correction.description: statement of what was updated/changed since prior version

material.description: the reagent, biological sample, or material such as PPE source materials) used or tested in this protocol

instrument.description: For LabProtocols it would be a laboratory equipment use by a person to follow one or more steps described in this LabProtocol.

measurementTechnique.description: A technique or technology used in this protocol.

protocolSetting.description: The type of 'protocol' based on setting in which it would apply

protocolCategory.description: The type of 'protocol' based on degree of specificity and purpose

usedToGenerate.description: Type of evidence/data generated by the protocol

inComplianceWith.description: Guidelines or Standards to which these protocols adhere. ie- GMP, GCP, other EQUATOR guidelines. Useful for selecting protocols where certain standards/guidelines must be met

author.description: person, people, or organization that created the protocol

citedBy.description: Associated guidelines, protocols, publications, etc. that include, adapt, modify, expand, etc. this protocol.

isBasedOn.description: Associated resource (guidelines, protocols, publications, etc.) from which this protocol was derived

relatedTo.description: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this protocol

curatedBy.description: The source from which this Protocol was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

controlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

miscControlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

citation.description: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the dataset (ie- is a derivative of the dataset) , related to the dataset, or from which the dataset was based on (ie- is derived from).

versionDate.description: Date of the version of the resource that is referenced

citeText.description: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided

name.description: The name of the monetary grant that funded/funds the Protocol

identifier.description: Unique identifier(s) for the grant(s) used to fund the Protocol

product.description: the reagent, biological sample, or material such as PPE source materials) used or tested in this protocol

name.description: The name of the material or reagent

manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the material, biosample, or reagent

brand.description: The name of the brand of the reagent, material, or biological sample (if different from the manufacturer)

identifier.description: The catalog number or identifier of the material or reagent

type.description: The type of material. Reagent, PPE, biological samples, etc.

instrument.description: A laboratory equipment use by a person to follow one or more steps described in this Protocol.

manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the material, biosample, or reagent

model.description: The model number of the instrument

@graph.rdfs:comment: url where the protocol can be found
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: An identifier associated with the protocol (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: A DOI associated with the protocol if available
@graph.rdfs:label: doi

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: description of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: description

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: status

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the measurement technique or assay type covered described by the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: measurementTechnique

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of research setting in which a "protocol" is appropriate, such as 'clinical', 'experimental', 'field', 'computational'
@graph.rdfs:label: protocolSetting

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of "protocol" such as guideline, procedure, policy, etc.
@graph.rdfs:label: protocolCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: person, people, or organization that created the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: author

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the author as provided by the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The author's affiliation(s)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: the reagent, biological sample, or material such as PPE source materials) used or tested in this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: material

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The manufacturer, brand, or vendor of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: The catalog number or identifier of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of material
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: For LabProtocols it would be a laboratory equipment use by a person to follow one or more steps described in this LabProtocol.
@graph.rdfs:label: instrument

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name/model number of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The manufacturer, brand, or vendor of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: Precautions, warnings, and/or safety warnings associated with the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: warning

@graph.rdfs:comment: License
@graph.rdfs:label: license

@graph.rdfs:comment: Funding for the generation of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: funding

@graph.rdfs:comment: The funder of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: funder

@graph.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the grant (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: PublicationDate of the protocol online if available
@graph.rdfs:label: datePublished

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date of protocol update
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModified

@graph.rdfs:comment: statement of what was updated/changed since prior version
@graph.rdfs:label: correction

@graph.rdfs:comment: Associated guidelines, protocols, publications, etc. that include, adapt, modify, expand, etc. this protocol.
@graph.rdfs:label: citedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the resource (publication, protocol, etc.) which was derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of resource which was derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier for this resource which was derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Associated resource (guidelines, protocols, publications, etc.) from which this protocol was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: isBasedOn

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the associated resource from which this protocol was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of resource (publication, analysis, ClinicalTrial, dataset, etc.) from which this protocol was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifier for the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: date of the version of the resource from which this protocol was derived. Note this is NOT the same as dateModified, as the protocol may be based on an earlier 'dateModified' than is what is available from the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier (if available_ of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Applicable outbreak.info category
@graph.rdfs:label: topicCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: keywords
@graph.rdfs:label: keywords

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of evidence/data generated by the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: usedToGenerate

@graph.rdfs:comment: Guidelines or Standards to which these protocols adhere. ie- GMP, GCP, other EQUATOR guidelines. Useful for selecting protocols where certain standards/guidelines must be met
@graph.rdfs:label: inComplianceWith

@graph.rdfs:comment: The time it takes to actually carry out the protocol, in ISO 8601 date format.
@graph.rdfs:label: duration

@graph.rdfs:comment: The source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another
@graph.rdfs:label: curatedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The corresponding url for the item in the source from which this Analysis was identified (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: The last date when items were pulled from the source
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date this resource was added to outbreak.info, or the date when this resource was updated in outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: curationDate
